sentences.en: A canoe made by hollowing out a tree trunk; a dugout.
sentences.cn: 独木舟将树干中心挖空制成的独木舟; 独木舟.

sentences.en: Dugout canoes are used to tra ort fresh goods to the market.
sentences.cn: 独木舟用于运输新鲜食物到市场上去.

sentences.en: Dugout canoes are used to transport fresh goods to the market.
sentences.cn: 独木舟用来运送新鲜食物去市场.

sentences.en: See him coming from the dugout to warm up.
sentences.cn: 您看他从地下室里出来了,开始做准备动作.

sentences.en: The still use traditional dugout canoes for traversing the fresh water lake.
sentences.cn: 仍然使用的淡水湖泊穿越传统的防空洞独木舟.

sentences.en: War thundered and whined around the dugout and battered at the door.
sentences.cn: 战斗在地下掩蔽部外面雷鸣着,而且猛击着入口.

words.tran_cn: 独木舟；防空壕；棒球场边供球员休息的地方

trans.tran_en: a small boat made by cutting out a hollow space in a tree trunk
